description: CDTA is a public transportation authority in the Capital Region.  This dataset presents information that reflects the organizations performance levels.  This dataset includes customer boarding’s, miles operated, accidents, preventative maintenance inspections, and complaints.

name: Capital District Transportation Authority (CDTA) Performance Metrics
